rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows and open-plan design to maximize natural light and ventilation. Decorated with Bohemian elements like vibrant textiles and eclectic furniture.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring an extended seating arrangement and a mix of natural wood finishes aligned with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Modern kitchen designed for functionality and efficiency. Large windows ensure ample daylight; layout arranged per Vastu norms ensuring positive energy flow.
Guest bedroom featuring natural ventilation with cross-ventilation features, decorated in a Bohemian style using vibrant colors and artisanal decor.
Functional bathroom integrated into the ground floor, designed with efficient water usage and natural light through frosted windows.

openings.description: Main entrance facing north-east to align with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large window openings in living and dining areas for enhanced natural light and cross ventilation.

rooms.description: Opulent master bedroom with east-facing windows ensuring abundant morning sunlight, designed in a Bohemian aesthetic with rich textures and patterns.
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light; features unique Bohemian wall art and soft furnishing to create a serene atmosphere.
Additional bedroom with ventilation and north-facing window, decorated with earthy tones aligned with Vastu guidelines for health and prosperity.
Modern ensuite bathroom designed with sustainable fixtures and ample natural lighting to promote well-being.
Private gym area on the first floor, optimized for space utilization. Large ventilated windows ensure fresh air circulation during workouts.

openings.description: East-facing window in master bedroom to harness morning sunlight and promote vitality.
Balcony area integrated into the gym for an outdoor workout space, promoting natural light and fresh air.
